page.description: Returns the name of the associated icon and icon type.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.ICON_GET() method returns the name of the icon associated with the icon type.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim iname as C dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Travel Time") iname = ptr.Icon_Get() ? iname = " $a5_form"
